feed.title: MetaFilter Deleted Posts
feed.subtitle: Posts. That have been deleted. From MetaFilter.

entry.title: The Bottom Line
entry.content:
Post 192324 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, sorry, but Metafilter is really not for personal blog type posts; if you'd like to rework this as a more standard post with the main link, please get in touch -- taz
entry.summary: Post 192324 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Hey, sorry, but Metafilter is really not for personal blog type posts; if you'd like to rework this as a more standard post with the main link, please get in touch -- taz

entry.title: Glenn Greenwald: the greatest journalist of all time?

link.title: Glenn Greenwald: the greatest journalist of all time?

entry.content:
Post 192308 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: There isn't really anything in this article that we haven't discussed at length, and it uses weasel words to hide Greenwald's legitimate problems; "pro bono work as a civil liberties defender" is doing a lot of work to smooth over the fact that he defended a violent white supremacist, called the minority victims "disgusting," and almost got disbarred for his courtroom misconduct. -- Eyebrows McGee
entry.summary: Post 192308 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: There isn't really anything in this article that we haven't discussed at length, and it uses weasel words to hide Greenwald's legitimate problems; "pro bono work as a civil liberties defender" is doing a lot of work to smooth over the fact that he defended a violent white supremacist, called the minority victims "disgusting," and almost got disbarred for his courtroom misconduct. -- Eyebrows McGee

entry.title: Are we experiencing global warming’s tipping point in real time?

link.title: Are we experiencing global warming’s tipping point in real time?

entry.content:
Post 192069 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: I'm not sure that Metafilter is the ideal audience for a "you need to spiral into utter hopeless despair more than you are already spiralling ... no, more than that!" pep talk. We kind of already have that aspect covered? (and as more than one mefite has noted of the author, "... Umair Haique ... makes me want to give up.") There is actually a still-open thread discussing required awareness quotient around catastrophic climate change, so maybe there is good post potential in a more "what people can actually do" sort of approach? Please contact us if you'd like to discuss! -- taz
entry.summary: Post 192069 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: I'm not sure that Metafilter is the ideal audience for a "you need to spiral into utter hopeless despair more than you are already spiralling ... no, more than that!" pep talk. We kind of already have that aspect covered? (and as more than one mefite has noted of the author, "... Umair Haique ... makes me want to give up.") There is actually a still-open thread discussing required awareness quotient around catastrophic climate change, so maybe there is good post potential in a more "what people can actually do" sort of approach? Please contact us if you'd like to discuss! -- taz

entry.title: “Send the abysmal chump to Romania! Hell, buy his ticket!”

link.title: “Send the abysmal chump to Romania! Hell, buy his ticket!”

entry.content:
Post 192018 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: This has received quite a few flags, and while on one hand it's kind of fun "hoist by your own petard" schadenfreude, there are a lot of interthreaded issues that have been pointed out in flags and in comments: wealth inequity, ethnic and financial prejudice, snide commentary on looks and weight, and some other ugliness ... ultimately this may be more the sort of thing that works on better on twitter or similar, but just not great for productive discussion on Mefi. -- taz
